item.description:
Usher in 2012 in supreme style at The Resolution Ball (hosted by BEG - Boston Event Guide), at The Seaport Hotel, on Boston's Waterfront. Many of our members have attended prior BEG events (Resolution Ball / Back Bay Gala's in 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010 - we're die-hard regulars!) and their events ROCK!
So a bunch of us have already bought tickets and are keen for as many people as possible to join us for this awesome party:

*** NOTE: This event is open to all adults of any age ***
*** Only entrance requirement is that you be at least 21 years old on 12/31 and keen to party!! ***

Your night to remember starts with a cocktail reception and your choice of either a scrumptious all-inclusive dinner or a delicious hors d’oeuvres reception.
Then, slide over to the dance floor, where the Felix Brown Band and DJ Samuel L. will provide you with Motown, 80s, 90s, and current top-40 dance & club hits to get you dancing. As the clock strikes 12, ring in the new year with tons of party favors from our sponsors. Watch the ball drop on huge multimedia displays!
For a $10 donation to The Ellie Fund guests will receive a VIP goody bag filled with items from our sponsors when they depart.

All-Inclusive Dinner Package (7.30pm - 2am) includes:
Enjoy cocktails, hors d'oeuvres and delicious dinner stations and desserts from 7:30pm - 9:30pm (menu below)
Entry into the grand celebration with The Felix Brown Band and NYC DJ Samuel L., dancing, midnight toast, and party favors
Only $199 until 12/28 then prices go up* to $259, $299

All-Inclusive Reception Only (8:30pm - 2am) Includes:
Cocktail & hors d'oeuvres reception (menu below) from 8:30 - 9:30pm
Entry into the grand celebration with The Felix Brown Band and NYC DJ Samuel L., dancing, midnight toast, and party favors
Only $149 until 12/28 then prices go up* to $179, $199

Party Only (9:30pm - 2am) Includes:
Entry into the grand celebration with The Felix Brown Band and NYC DJ Samuel L., dancing, midnight toast, and party favors
Only $75 until 12/28 then prices go up* to $89, $99, $129, $149

****Buy your ticket ASAP - prices are going up DAILY ****

PRICE: As at 12/26, $199/$149/$75 - NO SERVICE FEE IF YOU BUY YOUR TICKET ON 12/26! - prices are going up DAILY!

**** Buy your ticket ASAP - prices are going up DAILY ****
** The longer you wait to buy your ticket, the higher the price will be **
** Full price for this event will be as high as $250 this year **
** So if you want a good deal, do not delay buying your ticket!! **

You need to buy your own ticket directly from Boston Event Guide at: http://www.bostoneventguide.com/events/nye.htm

Hotel Rooms
Hotel rooms are available at a steep discount. Regular hotel price ranges from $299 - $499. Go to: http://www.bostoneventguide.com/events/nye.htm and scroll down to "Hotel Rooms" for full details and hotel contact numbers - at this point you will need to call the hotels re: availability of rooms at the discounted rates.
item.how_to_find_us: Will arrange a pre-party meeting spot closer to the time (possibly warm-up cocktails in some ones' room).
item.name: New Year's Eve Party: Resolution Ball - Seaport Hotel/World Trade Center
